summary: A small Vampiric Cave to house some small belongings and to snooze during the day. Just west of High Gates Ruins. West of Dawnstar Imperial Camp. NO DLC Required!!!!!
descriptionHtml:
Vampire Themed Cave, Basically its just a slight smaller version of Broken helm Hollow, I just copied and tweaked a few things, but made it a small home base.
This was just a quick starter area for my Female character as a childhood Fort, which is also named after her.

Also its a short distance away from my main home Morning Star [color=#a61c00][size=3]Vampire theme[/size][/color], check this one out as well.
Morning Star
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51833/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51833/[/url]?

Requirments: NONE

Alchemy Station with a couple Satchels and Strongbox: For the Necro/ Mages/ Alchemists
Enchanting Table with a couple satchels
A tanning Rack and Anvil for crafting
A few dwemer supply boxes for storage.
A secret door to the "Master Bed Room" Added a dresser, and a couple chests and a bed. There is a coffin but can't sleep in it.

Key is Behind the entrance look at screen shots past the tree. Its not locked!!!
author: Jrew
